name: Aquaphobia (itch) (husseini)
description:
Team Name:
The Codfathers

Modifier Category:
Audio Experience, Make Us Go WOW! Stylized

What platform is your game build for?
Windows

Description:
The idiom "fish out of water" represents feeling uncomfortable in one's environment. Our puffer fish is unable to thrive in it's environment due to fear or in this case, the wrong water source. We want our environment to mirror the human experience (as above, so below) to show that we often experience situations or challenges that we are uncomfortable with but through the right mindset or method, the impossible becomes attainable.

Number Player:
1

Gameplay Instruction:
Hold the jump button down to charge your jump. If you release the button or the max charge time is reached, the character will jump automatically towards the next landing zone. If you miss the landing zone and the character lands in the water, the game is over.

Jump Button:
Mouse: Left Mouse Button
Keyboard: Spacebar
Gamepad: Bottom Facebutton

Pause Button:
Keyboard: P-Key
Gamepad: Right Special Button

List any content that was created before the jam:

  • VR Template Laser Trace Visualizer effect 
  • [SCANS] Construction Site: Loader water effect
  • Music and Sound effects from https://www.weloveindies.com/en
  • Megascan assets for environment
